overview: In Davi's Way, legendary actor/singer Robert Davi is gives himself one year to recreate Frank Sinatra's fabled 'Main Event' concert in Madison Square Garden to celebrate the centenary of Sinatra's 100th birthday. This unpredictable, poignant and comedic documentary, a real life cross between Curb Your Enthusiasm and This Is Spinal Tap, features a side (and voice) of the action film heavy that will astound his legion of fans.
tagline: His Dream Was To Re-create Sinatra's Main Event.
title: Davi's Way
